seeking_immortals.jei.necora.giant_night: Requires wearing Nightmare Giant genetic fragment to be found in treasure loot
seeking_immortals.jei.nightmare: : Requires wearing nightmare eye to be found in dungeons and mines
seeking_immortals.super_nightmare.name: Only those wearing the Nightmare Base
item.wolf.tool.string: Killing each type of creature will increase your life and armor by 1 point
item.wolf.tool.string.1: You deal an additional 25% damage to creatures you have previously killed
item.wolf.tool.string.2: Mark nearby units that you have patrolled
item.wolf.tool.string.3: Each time you are injured, the damage is transferred to them; if a unit dies, the item enters a 5-second cooldown
seeking_immortals.item.kill: You haven't worn it yet, you haven't killed a creature
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Have your wolf kill the Warden
item.nightmare_base.tool.string.1: Evil Thought Antimony, Blood Cruel Lead, Malicious Mourning Nullification
item.nightmare_base_stone.tool.string: Damage taken increases by 500% when health is full
item.nightmare_base_stone.tool.string.1: But you can unlock the following items
item.seeking_immortals.ectoplasmstar.nig: Double luck, and each point of luck increases healing by 2.5%
item.seeking_immortals.ectoplasmstar.max: All effect BUFF levels increase by 2
item.nightmare_base_stone_virus.tool.str: Any damage received will additionally inflict a penalty of 25% of the maximum health, unaffected by any bonuses
item.nightmare_base_stone_brain.tool.str: Damage reduced by 100% when at full health
Damage increased by 50% when not at full health
Resistance increased by 50% when not at full health
item.nightmare_base_black_eye.tool.strin: Blurred vision from the injury that recovers over time
But you can unlock the following items
item.nightmare_base_black_eye_eye.tool.s: Creatures under your gaze will be unable to move
They will also receive a large amount of negative BUFFs
When you look at any creature, you will gain a 25% damage bonus
item.nightmare_base_black_eye_red.tool.s: Killing creatures increases all attributes by 5%
Up to a maximum increase of 50%
These attributes will decrease over time
item.nightmare_base_black_eye_heart.tool: They will restore health to you
And they will no longer receive any healing
advancements.tooltip.nightmare_base_ston: Get the Brain of the End Times
advancements.tooltip.nightmare_base_blac: Gain the Eyes of Evil Thoughts
item.nightmare_base_reversal.tool.string: Attributes gradually recover at a rate of 4% per second after resurrection
item.nightmare_base_reversal_orb.tool.st: Resets health to full every 10 seconds
item.nightmare_base_reversal_card.tool.s: The speed of attribute recovery during each resurrection is reduced to 2%
But can only recover up to 150% of the original
Suppress the negative effects of the Nightmare Base at the cost of reducing all attributes by 10%
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: , requires wearing:
Trigger the Undying Totem acquisition when the following conditions are met: Poisoned, Withering, Slowness, Blindness, and on Fire
Kill the Guardian
Found in Ancient Cities, about 5% chance
Kill Zombies to obtain materials, but only one of this material can be obtained
Kill the Ender Dragon
Triggered by receiving Withering damage to get an Undying Totem
Kill the Ender Dragon
Open chests in Ancient Cities while wearing Reversal Orb, 100% chance, but can only obtain one
Kill yourself with poison damage from the Reversal Object
item.nightmare_base_redemption.tool.stri: Increase 15% decay of Nightmare Base attributes
item.nightmare_base_redemption_deception: Resist lethal damage, restore all health
And gain 7 seconds of invincibility and calm the rage of nearby creatures, cooldown 60 seconds
item.nightmare_base_redemption_down_and_: Reduce 35% decay of Nightmare Base attributes, if it drops to negative, it turns into a positive attribute increase
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Kill 100 Pillagers under an ominous sign
Kill 100 Villagers under the Village Hero effect
Complete a failed raid
item.end_bone.tool.string: Reduces speed by 50% and damage received by 80% when at full health
item.end_bone.tool.string.1: When at full health, damage received is reflected back to the attacker at 700% of the original amount
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Obtained by killing the Guardian, one player can only get one
item.nightmare_base_fool.tool.string: Starting from 2 pieces, each additional accessory will reduce health by 1%
item.nightmare_base_fool.tool.string.1: Starting from 5 pieces, each additional accessory will reduce damage by 2%
item.nightmare_base_fool.tool.string.2: Damage and health penalty of 50% or less.
item.nightmare_base_fool_betray.tool.str: Makes some types of nearby creatures actively ally with you
Allying creatures gain positive BUFFs consistent with you
The master of the possessed servant loses 10% of maximum health
Cooldown increases by 5 seconds for each target possessed
item.nightmare_base_fool_bone.tool.strin: If a creature's attack target is you
Then your damage to it is doubled
And attacks have a 30% chance to break the invincibility frame
item.nightmare_base_fool_soul.tool.strin: Fool's Danger damage penalty judgment increased from 5 to 14
Fool's Danger life penalty judgment increased from 2 to 9
Each accessory worn increases healing by 3%
Each Nightmare accessory increases health by 6
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Kill the Ender Dragon
Kill the Guardian
Kill the Wither
item.nightmare_base_insight.tool.string: Reduce the enchantment level of enchanted items by 1
Reduce the enchantment level of enchanted items by 50%
item.nightmare_base_insight_drug.tool.st: But for each accessory worn, this bonus will decrease by 8%
Restore health based on the intensity of the slain creature
And the damage of the next attack increases by 150%
item.nightmare_base_insight_collapse.too: Double the number of universal accessory slots
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Given when the player has 9 different positive potion statuses
Die or jump into the End portal to return to the Overworld
Kill the Ender Dragon
item.tricky_puppets.tool.string: Allows you to mark container blocks within a radius of 20 blocks
item.tricky_puppets.tool.string.1: Marked blocks will emit light as you get closer to them
item.tricky_puppets.tool.string.2: You can see through blocks to them
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Found in Woodland Mansions, probability 75%, one player can only obtain one
Obtained by killing a creature with health greater than 30 times your max health, only one per player
item.ring.tool.string: Eternal Power, Resistance, Health Regeneration, Urgency, Health Boost
item.ring.tool.string.1: For every 3rd level or higher potion effect obtained
item.ring.tool.string.3: When any potion effect ends, you will recover 4 health points
item.ring.tool.string.4: If the potion effect is negative, recover 10% of your max health
advancements.tooltip.ring.hand: An inch of time is worth an inch of gold
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Triggers the Totem of the Undead when more than 10 negative buffs are obtained, only one per player
item.immortal.tool.string: 80% chance to evade and reflect 50% of damage to the attacker
item.immortal.tool.string.1: If the attacker is >70%, reflect 150% of the damage and break the invincibility frame
item.immortal.tool.string.2: Apply a Withered Buff to nearby mobs every 5 seconds, up to a maximum of level 5
item.immortal.tool.string.3: Applied creatures have 20% less Resistance, Armor, Heal, and 5% Damage, Movement Speed, Attack Speed per level
item.immortal.tool.string.4: If you are killed, deal 20% of the attacker's current health as piercing damage and add level 10 Wither (10s)
item.immortal.tool.string.6: It is rumored that a person who wields the power of the cycle of life and death...
advancements.tooltip.immortal.text: “I've long been tired of reincarnation again and again”
item.candle.tool.string: Increases damage taken by 1000% when at full health
item.candle.tool.string.2: Gains invincibility protection based on damage taken at full health
item.candle.tool.string.3: Gain 0.05 seconds of invincibility for every 10 health points (not exceeding 5 seconds)
item.candle.tool.string.4: During any period of invincibility protection
item.candle.tool.string.6: Exempts from injury penalties of the Death Omen Obelisk
advancements.tooltip.candle.text: Fix Death Omen's curse, but at what cost?
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Crafting to obtain
item.nightmare_axe.tool.string: Kill creatures to summon the Chaos Battle Axe
item.hypocritical_self_esteem.tool.strin: You will gain the following boosts for each entity nearby.
If you have suffered the curse of Malevolent Gaze.. then:
Bite nearby creatures, dealing 20% of your displayed damage every 0.5 seconds
Damage increases by 20% for each additional target
Each bite will absorb health from the target and weaken them
advancements.tooltip.hypocritical_self_e: Do not destroy the self-esteem of the weak
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: In the presence of withered state, deliver the final blow to the Ender Dragon with an empty hand; only one player can obtain it
item.nightmare_base_start.tool.string.1: Every time you take damage, it forcibly reduces 1 health point
item.nightmare_base_start.tool.string.2: Does not trigger when the health is below 10
item.nightmare_base_start_power.tool.str: For each positive potion effect present
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: Kill the Guardian
Kill the Sniffer
Open dungeon chests, 25% chance, can only get one
item.disintegrating_stone.tool.string: This item's stats increase as you install more mods
item.disintegrating_stone.tool.string.1: Cosmetic items from any mod will be neutralized
item.eye.tool.string.1: Tear the creatures you look at, weaken them and restore your health
item.eye.tool.string.2: Assuming you are at full health at the time of the bite, the excess recovered health will be stored in the item
item.eye.tool.string.3: When you take critical damage and have more than 200% of your Max Health
item.eye.tool.string.4: Consume all your health and avoid this death incidentally restoring you to full health
item.eye.tool.string.6: You need to look at mobs to get blood
item.falling_immortals.tool.string.1: You will no longer be subject to any form of property bonus or reduction
seeking_immortals.jei.item.seeking_immor: While wearing the Tilted Fruit, the Eye of Ender is held in the main hand to kill the withering (in fact, it will directly replace the Tilted Fruit with the Fallen Immortal)
item.hidden_blade.tool.string.2: Critical Hit for 3 seconds after attack
item.hidden_blade.tool.string.3: Attack Speed Increases Gradually While Dealing Non-Critical Damage
item.hidden_blade.tool.string.4: Damage gradually increases as critical damage is dealt
seeking_immortals.element.name: Press ALT to view features
item.yoke.tool.string: Every 10 Elements of Destiny grants a level 1 Shackles of War buff
item.yoke.tool.string.1: Increases damage by 10% and speed by 5% per level
item.yoke.tool.string.2: Reduces armor and health by 10% per level
item.muddy_jewels.tool.string.1: Weakens 100% of the curse of the peep of evil thoughts
